about_the_game:
CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic Shogatsu Gifts ALL in PACK features a ton of content, including some Japanese-style costumes!
If you have certain personality packs, you'll get new events to try out!

26 events
3 yotogi skills
6 costume sets
17 body parts
1 Studio Mode background

All of the above will be added to your game, giving you more gameplay possibilities.
*You must have already hired maids with compatible personalities to play these events.

【Events】
*Year-end party (Muku, Majime, Rindere)
*Happy New Year (Muku, Majime, Rindere)
*Together with everyone (Muku)
*Which one do you like? (Muku)
*Drink, but don't get drunk (Majime)
*Which should I choose? (Majime)
*How to enjoy the party (Rindere)
*A precious present (Rindere)
*A cute request (Bookworm)
*Do you hate noisy? (Bookworm)
※You must have already installed "Personality Pack Quiet and Love to be Pampered, Bookworm."
*An excitable drunk? (Sweet Little Devil)
*Speaking of New Year's… (Sweet Little Devil)
※You must have already installed "Personality Pack Naturally Sadistic, Sweet Little Devil."
*Mochi of happiness (Ladylike)
*Keep me company (Ladylike)
※You must have already installed "Personality Pack Sexy and Ladylike Woman."
*Memories and the present (Secretary Maid)
*New Year's temptation (Secretary Maid)
※You must have already installed "Personality Pack Mature, Level-Headed, and Dependable Secretary Maid."
*Is Santa real? (Soft Cuddly Girl)
*Until we see the sunrise (Soft Cuddly Girl)
※You must have already installed "Personality Pack Soft Cuddly Girl."
*New Year's Eve TV (Blunt)
*Starting the new year off right (Blunt)
※You must have already installed "Personality Pack Guarded, Blunt Girl."
*What do you want your first dream of the year to be? (Preppy Girl)
*Bar etiquette (Preppy Girl)
※You must have already installed "Personality Pack Overbearing and Preppy Girl Maid."
*What I want most (Long-lost Friend)
*The power of booze (Long-lost Friend)
※You must have already installed "Personality Pack Sweet, Affectionate, and Devoted Long-lost Friend."
*A surprising truth (Extreme Sadist)
*I can't hide anything from her (Extreme Sadist)
※You must have already installed "Personality Pack The Extreme Sadist Queen who Arouses the Hearts of Masochists."

【Yotogi Skill】
-Love Festival Maid-
*Spread legs spooning sex
*Spread legs spooning anal
*Love blowjob

【Costume】
*Shrine Maiden Set
*Nadeshiko Maid Outfit
*Cute Shrine Maiden Set
*Japonesque Café Set
*Cherry Blossom Performing Set
*Miko Hoodie Set

【Studio Mode BG】
*Large Japanese-Style Bar

【Studio Mode Items】
*Fried Chicken
*Stew
*Rolled Omelet
*Sake Bottle & Cup
*Skewer

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult content intended for individuals 18 years of age or older.
It includes nudity, sex scene, and blatantly sexual imagery, as well as imagery that has sexual implications.
If you are not yet 18+ or if you are accessing from any country or located where adult material is specifically prohibited by law, do not play this game.
